title: Is There a Suits LA Season 1 Episode 11 Release Date or Part 2?
description: Viewers are eager to know if there’s a release date and time for Suits LA Season 1 Episode 11, or the possibility of a Part 2. The television series is the second spin-off of the popular legal drama Suits. It follows former federal prosecutor Ted Black, who now represents elite clients in Los Angeles with […] The post Is There a Suits LA Season 1 Episode 11 Release Date or Part 2? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Curious if Suits LA Season 1 has an Episode 11 release date and time or Part 2? Here's all you need to know!
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Viewers are eager to know if there’s a release date and time for Suits LA Season 1 Episode 11, or the possibility of a Part 2. The television series is the second spin-off of the popular legal drama Suits. It follows former federal prosecutor Ted Black, who now represents elite clients in Los Angeles with a focus on criminal and entertainment law. After the recent airing of Episode 10, fans are excited to see what comes next. So, here’s everything you need to know about whether there’s a possibility of a Part 2 or Episode 11 for Suits LA Season 1. Suits LA Season 1 Episode 11 release date and time explained There isn’t a Suits LA Season 1 Episode 11 release date and time. This is because it has officially wrapped up, featuring a total of 10 episodes. With the release of the tenth episode marking the end of the first installment, there will be no Episode 11 or Part 2 with additional episodes. In this captivating legal drama, viewers follow the life of Ted Black, a former federal prosecutor who started a new life after a scandal forced him to leave behind what he did before. Black establishes a law practice in Los Angeles. The television series delves into the high-stakes legal battles of Hollywood, where glamor and fierce competition collide, involving celebrities, tricky contracts, and some very lucrative deals. Has Suits LA Season 1 ended? Yes, Suits LA Season 1 has finished. It debuted on February 23, 2025, featuring a total of 10 episodes that aired weekly. The first installment then concluded on April 27, 2025. As of now, there has been no official announcement regarding the release date and time for Season 2. Nevertheless, ScreenRant reports that NBC is contemplating the renewal of the show. This news comes despite the spin-off being unable to attract high ratings and its inability to match the popularity of its predecessor during its original airing. Where to watch previous Suits LA Season 1 episodes You can watch Suits LA Season 1 via NBC and Peacock. All episodes of the television series are available for viewing on NBC. They were also made available on Peacock the very next day. While NBC is a highly reputable and one of the oldest cable networks, Peacock provides an excellent streaming experience with a plethora of entertaining titles. The series’ synopsis reads: “Ted Black, a former federal prosecutor from New York, has reinvented himself representing the most powerful clients in Los Angeles. But his firm is at a crisis point, and in order to survive, he must embrace a role he held in contempt his entire career.”
html:
Viewers are eager to know if there’s a release date and time for Suits LA Season 1 Episode 11, or the possibility of a Part 2. The television series is the second spin-off of the popular legal drama Suits. It follows former federal prosecutor Ted Black, who now represents elite clients in Los Angeles with a focus on criminal and entertainment law. After the recent airing of Episode 10, fans are excited to see what comes next.

So, here’s everything you need to know about whether there’s a possibility of a Part 2 or Episode 11 for Suits LA Season 1.

Suits LA Season 1 Episode 11 release date and time explained

There isn’t a Suits LA Season 1 Episode 11 release date and time. This is because it has officially wrapped up, featuring a total of 10 episodes. With the release of the tenth episode marking the end of the first installment, there will be no Episode 11 or Part 2 with additional episodes.

In this captivating legal drama, viewers follow the life of Ted Black, a former federal prosecutor who started a new life after a scandal forced him to leave behind what he did before. Black establishes a law practice in Los Angeles. The television series delves into the high-stakes legal battles of Hollywood, where glamor and fierce competition collide, involving celebrities, tricky contracts, and some very lucrative deals.

Has Suits LA Season 1 ended?

Yes, Suits LA Season 1 has finished. It debuted on February 23, 2025, featuring a total of 10 episodes that aired weekly. The first installment then concluded on April 27, 2025.

As of now, there has been no official announcement regarding the release date and time for Season 2. Nevertheless, ScreenRant reports that NBC is contemplating the renewal of the show. This news comes despite the spin-off being unable to attract high ratings and its inability to match the popularity of its predecessor during its original airing.

Where to watch previous Suits LA Season 1 episodes

You can watch Suits LA Season 1 via NBC and Peacock.

All episodes of the television series are available for viewing on NBC. They were also made available on Peacock the very next day. While NBC is a highly reputable and one of the oldest cable networks, Peacock provides an excellent streaming experience with a plethora of entertaining titles.

The series’ synopsis reads:

“Ted Black, a former federal prosecutor from New York, has reinvented himself representing the most powerful clients in Los Angeles. But his firm is at a crisis point, and in order to survive, he must embrace a role he held in contempt his entire career.”
